summary.span: Representa una clave de seguridad que se genera utilizando el algoritmo de RSA.

span.span: Represents a security key that is generated using the RSA algorithm.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks admite longitudes de clave desde 384 bits hasta 16384 bits en incrementos de 8 bits si tiene Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider instalado.The supports key lengths from 384 bits to 16384 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed. Admite longitudes de clave desde 384 bits hasta 512 bits en incrementos de 8 bits si tiene Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider instalado.It supports key lengths from 384 bits to 512 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider installed.
